helper

Class DataContainerHeaderWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.DataContainerHeaderWriter

  • public class DataContainerHeaderWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Writer for the binary data container format used within the system. Currently only used by module.pgpcrpto.control.PGPCryptoModule.
    Author:
    Stefan Werner
